name: Devan PIERSON, Petitioner, v. UNITED STATES.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Devan PIERSON, Petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit for further consideration in light of Rehaif v. United States , 588 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 2191, 204 L.Ed.2d 594 (2019).
casebody.head_matter:
Devan PIERSON, Petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES.
No. 19-566.
Supreme Court of the United States.
March 9, 2020.
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit. Petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit for further consideration in light of Rehaif v. United States , 588 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 2191, 204 L.Ed.2d 594 (2019).
